original_title: More than 25 MPs sign NCM against Keheliya
original_body_lines: Around 25 MPs including some of those who have voted in favour of the government on various instances have signed the no-confidence motion on Minister of Health Keheliya Rambukwella today.
MPs Kumara Welgama, Anura Priyadarshana Yapa were among the pro-government MPs who signed the motion.
TNA MP Selvarasa Kajendran also signed the motion on behalf of his party while the National People’s Power led by the JVP is also expected to back the motion.
Others who have signed the motion are Leader of the Opposition Sajith Premadasa, Rajitha Senaratne, Chandima Weerakkody, Ranjith Madduma Bandara, Lakshman Kiriella and Hesha Vithnage.
SLFP General Secretary Dayasiri Jaysekera said his party is yet to decide on its stand on the motion.
Samagi Jana Balawegaya (SJB) General Secretary Ranjith Madduma Bandara said the opposition group led by Dullas Alahapperuma is also expected to back the motion. (Yohan Perera and Ajith Siriwardana)
